tvAma#gnE vRuShaqBaM cEki#tAnaqM punaqryuvA#naM jaqnaya#nnuqpAgA$M | 
aqsthUqri NOq gAr.ha#patyAni santu tiqgmEna# nOq brahma#NAq sa(gm) Si#SAdhi ||
paqSavOq vA EqtE yadiShTa#kAqScityA$M cityAmRuShaqBamupa# dadhAti 
mithuqnamEqvAsyaq tad-yaqj~jE ka#rOti praqjana#nAyaq tasmA$d-yUqthEyU#tha RuShaqBaH || 
saqM~Mvaqthsaqrasya# pratiqmAM ~MyAM tvA# rAtryuqpAsa#tE | 
praqjA(gm) suqvIrA$M kRuqtvA viSvaqmAyuqrvya#Snavat || 
prAqjAqpaqtyA - [  ] 4
